Class CommunicationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • server.CommunicationHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class CommunicationHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class CommunicationHandler Create and manipulate a Communication Handler Handle all the communications between the Client and the Server
    Author:
    Diego Deloffre, Maxime Senger, Joris Loit and Pierre Fourre

                            int clientId,
                            VueServer vue)
        Create a new Communication Handler with an entreprise, a SocketServer, a client id and a vue
        Parameters:
        entreprise - entreprise linked with the server
        socketOfServer - the socket of the server used to communicate
        clientId - id of the client connected
        vue - graphical interface
